game

Class MainGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.MainGame

  • public class MainGame
extends java.lang.Object
    The MainGame controls the game loop, as well as holds objects such as the Map or each Drone
    Author:
    Team Rosetta

      This method iterates through each Drone and checks all its needs, power, repair, and gas.

      This method, provided the resources are available, spawns a new Drone in the Engineering Building

      This method iterates through each Building and performs its associated behavior.

      This method iterates through each Drone and executes their assigned Task.

      This method performs weather behavior, such as the day/night cycle and storms.
